document.query: CREATE TABLE `graph_data_1m` ( `id` BIGINT(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `common_symbol` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `high` DECIMAL(27,10) NOT NULL, `low` DECIMAL(27,10) NOT NULL, `open` DECIMAL(27,10) NOT NULL, `close` DECIMAL(27,10) NOT NULL, `volume` DECIMAL(27,10) NOT NULL, `amount` DECIMAL(27,10) NOT NULL, `change` DECIMAL(27,10) NOT NULL, `created_at` DATETIME NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `common_symbol` (`common_symbol`), UNIQUE KEY `symbol_created_at` (`common_symbol`,`created_at`), KEY `created_at` (`created_at`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `graph_data_5m` ( `id` BIGINT(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `common_symbol` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `high` DECIMAL(27,10) NOT NULL, `low` DECIMAL(27,10) NOT NULL, `open` DECIMAL(27,10) NOT NULL, `close` DECIMAL(27,10) NOT NULL, `volume` DECIMAL(27,10) NOT NULL, `amount` DECIMAL(27,10) NOT NULL, `change` DECIMAL(27,10) NOT NULL, `created_at` DATETIME NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `common_symbol` (`common_symbol`), UNIQUE KEY `symbol_created_at` (`common_symbol`,`created_at`), KEY `created_at` (`created_at`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `graph_data_1mt` ( `id` BIGINT(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `common_symbol` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `high` DECIMAL(27,10) NOT NULL, `low` DECIMAL(27,10) NOT NULL, `open` DECIMAL(27,10) NOT NULL, `close` DECIMAL(27,10) NOT NULL, `volume` DECIMAL(27,10) NOT NULL, `amount` DECIMAL(27,10) NOT NULL, `change` DECIMAL(27,10) NOT NULL, `created_at` DATETIME NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `common_symbol` (`common_symbol`), UNIQUE KEY `symbol_created_at` (`common_symbol`,`created_at`), KEY `created_at` (`created_at`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;
